info.title: JustFix API
info.description: Api for accessing housing data maintained by JustFix.

address.description: Street address (house number and street name) of property.

landlord_slug.description: Landlord name in slug format. Same as 'collection_slug' for collection page

lender.description: Name of lender for Signature debt

lender_slug.description: Lender name in slug format. Same as 'collection_slug' for collection page

link_hpd.description: Link to HPD Online for the building. Direct to building page if property has only building, to BBL search results if there are multiple buildings in the BBL

link_acris.description: Link to ACRIS for the building.

link_dob.description: Link to DOB's website for the building.

link_dap.description: Link to ANHD's DAP Portal for the building.

rs_units.description: Number of registered rent stabilized units. Most recent non-zero value 2019-2022.

last_sale_date.description: Date of the most recent sale of the property, from deed record

debt_total.description: Property's total Signature debt (includes portion of multi-property loans)

water_charges.description: Outstanding water charges due to the city

bip.description: UNHP's Building Indicator Project (BIP) score. Combines unpaid charges to the city and HPD violations.

in_aep.description: Whether the building is currently in HPD's Alternative Enforcement Program

in_conh.description: Whether the building is currently in HPD's Certificate of No Harassment pilot program

in_ucp.description: Whether the building is currently in HPD's Underlying Conditions Program

evictions_executed.description: Evictions executed by marshals in previous 12 months

evictions_filed.description: Eviction cases filed in housing court in previous 12 months

hpd_comp_emerg_total.description: Number of Emergency HPD complaints in previous 12 months

hpd_comp_apts.description: List of apartments that have submitted HPD complaints in previous 12 months

hpd_comp_apts_pct.description: Share of units in the property that have made HPD complaints in previous 12 months

hpd_comp_heat.description: Number of HPD complaints related to lack of heat or hot water in previous 12 months

hpd_comp_water.description: Number of HPD complaints related to water leaks or mold in previous 12 months

hpd_comp_pests.description: Number of HPD complaints related to pests in previous 12 months

hpd_viol_bc_total.description: Total number of B & C class HPD violations in previous 12 months

hpd_viol_bc_open.description: Number of open B & C class HPD violations since 2010

hpd_viol_bc_open_per_unit.description: Number of open B & C class HPD violations since 2010, per unit

hpd_viol_heat.description: Number of HPD violations related to heat/hot water

hpd_viol_water.description: Number of HPD violations related to leaks/mold

hpd_viol_pests.description: Number of HPD violations related to pests

hpd_erp_orders.description: Number of HPD Emergency Repair Program work orders in the last 12 months

hpd_erp_charges.description: Total dollar amount of charges from HPD Emergency Repair Program work orders in the last 12 months

hpd_erp_charges_per_unit.description: Total dollar amount of charges from HPD Emergency Repair Program work orders in the last 12 months, per unit

last_rodent_date.description: The date of the most recent DOHMH rodent inspection

last_rodent_result.description: Result of the most recent DOHMH rodent inspection ('Passed' or 'Failed').

dob_jobs.description: Number of DOB Job Application Filings for the building in the last 12 months.

dob_ecb_viol_total.description: Number of DOB/ECB violations in the last 12 months.

month.description: The month of data for all chart values, in YYYY-MM format. Values can be aggregated for quarterly or yearly chart versions.

hpdviolations_class_a.description: Number of class A HPD violations in the given month.

hpdviolations_class_b.description: Number of class B HPD violations in the given month.

hpdviolations_class_c.description: Number of class C HPD violations in the given month.

hpdviolations_class_i.description: Number of class I HPD violations in the given month.

hpdviolations_total.description: Total nNumber of HPD violations in the given month.

hpdcomplaints_emergency.description: Number of emergency HPD complaints in the given month.

hpdcomplaints_nonemergency.description: Number of class non-emergency HPD complaints in the given month.

hpdcomplaints_total.description: Total number of HPD complaints in the given month.

dobviolations_regular.description: Number of regular DOB violations in the given month.

dobviolations_ecb.description: Number of ECB type DOB violations in the given month.

dobviolations_total.description: Total number of DOB violations in the given month.

collection_slug.description: Collection name slug, used for API and URL

buildings.description: Number of properties (BBLs) in the collection

units_res.description: Total number of residential units in the collection

rs_units.description: Total number of registered rent stabilized units in the collection. Most recent non-zero value 2019-2022.

evictions_filed.description: Total number of eviction cases filed in the last 12 months in the collection.

bip_500_pct.description: Percent of buildings in the collection with a BIP score of 500 or greater.

hpd_viol_bc_open.description: Total number of open B & C class HPD violations in the collection, since 2010

hpd_viol_bc_open_per_unit.description: The average number of open B & C class HPD violations per unit in the collection, since 2010

hpd_viol_bc_total.description: Total number of B & C class HPD violations in the previous 12 months in the collection

hpd_viol_bc_total_per_unit.description: The average number of B & C class HPD violations per unit in the previous 12 months in the collection

hpd_comp_emerg_total.description: Total number of Emergency HPD complaints in the previous 12 months in the collection

hpd_comp_emerg_total_per_unit.description: The average number of Emergency HPD complaints per unit in the previous 12 months in the collection

hpd_erp_orders.description: Total number of HPD Emergency Repair Program work orders in the last 12 months in the collection

hpd_erp_orders_per_unit.description: Total number of HPD Emergency Repair Program work orders in the last 12 months per unit in the collection

hpd_erp_charges.description: Total dollar amount of charges from HPD Emergency Repair Program work orders in the last 12 months in the collection

hpd_erp_charges_per_unit.description: Total dollar amount of charges from HPD Emergency Repair Program work orders in the last 12 months per unit in the collection

dob_ecb_viol_open_per_unit.description: Number of active DOB/ECB violations per unit in the collection (since 2010)

water_charges.description: Total outstanding water charges due to the city for all buildings in the collection

debt_total.description: The total Signature debt of the collection

debt_per_building.description: The average Signature debt per building in the collection

debt_per_unit.description: The average Signature debt per unit in the collection

bldg_data.description: Array of buildings in the collection

landlord_slug.description: Landlord name slug, used for API and URL

lender_slug.description: Lender name slug, used for API and URL

buildings.description: Number of properties (BBLs) in the collection

units_res.description: Total number of residential units in the collection

hpd_viol_bc_open_per_unit.description: The average number of open B & C class HPD violations per unit in the collection, since 2010

debt_per_unit.description: The average Signature debt per unit in the collection

collection_slug.description: Collection name slug for the portfolio, used for API and URL. (all, cpc, santander)

buildings.description: Total number of buildings in the collection

landlords.description: Total number of landlords in the collection

address.description: Street address (house number and street name) of property.

lender_slug.description: Lender name slug, used for API and URL

get.summary: Returns data for the dashboard's Building page for the requested property (BBL).

parameters.name: bbl
parameters.description: BBL of the property, in 10-digit zero-padded format

200.description: Data for the dashboard's Building page associated with the BBL. Returns empty list if the BBL is not part of the Signature portfolio.

400.description: Bad Request. BBL should be a 10-digit padded BBL.

get.summary: Returns data for charts on the dashboard's Building page for the requested property (BBL).

parameters.name: bbl
parameters.description: BBL of the property, in 10-digit zero-padded format

200.description: Monthly longitudinal data (2010-present) for the charts on the dashboard's Building page associated with the BBL. Returns empty list if the BBL is not part of the Signature portfolio. The first portion of the indicator names indicate the chart it belongs too, and some charts will include multiple indicators, for example as stacked bars.

400.description: Bad Request. BBL should be a 10-digit padded BBL.

get.summary: Returns data for the dashboard's Collection page for the requested collection (landlord, lender, all).

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: Name for the collection in slug format. (<landlord-name>, cpc, santander, all)

200.description: Data for the dashboard's Collection page for the requested collection.

400.description: Bad Request. Collection should be 'all' or landlord/lender name in slug format.

get.summary: Returns data for charts on the dashboard's Collection page for the requested collection (landlord, lender, all).

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: Name for the collection in slug format. (<landlord-name>, cpc, santander, all)

200.description: Monthly longitudinal data (2010-present) for the charts on the dashboard's Collection page for the requested collection. Returns empty list if the collection is not part of the Signature portfolio. The first portion of the indicator names indicate the chart it belongs too, and some charts will include multiple indicators, for example as stacked bars.

400.description: Bad Request. Collection should be 'all' or landlord/lender name in slug format.

get.summary: Returns data for table of all landlords on the dashboard's Landlord search page.

200.description: Data for every landlord in the signature portfolio, with select aggregate stats, to populate the exploration table on the landlord search page.

get.summary: Returns data for signature/lender portfolios to use on home page cards.

200.description: Data for entire Signature portfolio and each lender for cards on home and lender pages.

get.summary: Returns a list of all BBLs in the Signature portfolio, to limit results from GeoSearch Autocomplete API for address search function

200.description: List of all BBLs in the Signature portfolio

get.summary: Returns a data for all properties in the Signature portfolio to populate the dedicated map page of the dashboard.

200.description: List properties with address, lender/landlord links, and lat/long coordinates
